properties.areaDesc: Northern Cheyenne Indian Reservation/Ashland Ranger District Custer Natl Forest; Northern Rosebud/Northern Treasure Counties; Crow Indian Reservation/Big Horn Canyon Rec Area; Golden Valley County/Musselshell County; Yellowstone County
properties.headline: Red Flag Warning issued March 3 at 3:25AM MST until March 4 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Billings MT
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Billings has issued a Red Flag
Warning...which is in effect from 8 AM this morning to 6 PM MST
Wednesday.

* IMPACTS: Low humidities and strong gusty winds will create
erratic fire behavior and new fire starts.

* AFFECTED AREA:
In South Central MT Fire Zones...127...128...129.
In Southeast MT Fire Zones...130...131.

* COUNTIES AFFECTED:
In Central MT...Golden Valley...Musselshell.
In South Central MT...Big Horn...Carbon...Yellowstone.
In Southeast MT...Powder River...Rosebud...Treasure.

* WIND: Northwest 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. Winds will
relax tonight then restrengthen Wednesday morning.

* HUMIDITY: As low as 18 percent.
properties.instruction:
A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are
either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong
winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute
to extreme fire behavior.

NWSheadline: RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM MST WEDNESDAY
